parser.ast

Class Updates

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.ast.ASTElement
      • parser.ast.Updates

  • public class Updates
extends ASTElement
    Class to store a list of updates with associated probabilities (or rates). e.g. 0.5:(s'=1)&(x'=x+1) + 0.5:(s'=2)&(x'=x-1)

    • Field Summary

      private java.util.ArrayList<Expression> probs 
      private java.util.ArrayList<Update> updates

      Add a probability (or rate) and update pair (probability/rate can be null, which equates to 1.0).
